channel.title: Twitter on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Humans are not so sad creatures
item.description: With the birth of the Internet, the world has changed dramatically. Now with just one smartphone, you can instantly do various things such as research, shopping, communication, entertainment consumption, and information dissemination. As efficiency went on, people’s tasks continued to diminish, and even ** began to disappear. **The everyday life is spreading, in which people act like the information recommended by AI and like the posts that everyone likes.

item.title: [Python] Create a TwitterBot with Python!
item.description: ## What is TwitterBot? Bot is the etymology of Robot, and refers to something that automatically does something. On Twitter Auto Tweet Bot Auto Like Bot Auto follow bot There are various bots. What are the benefits of Bot? Automatic Tweets act like notifications. For example, “we tweet automatically when the live information of your favorite artist is updated”. Auto Like and Auto Follow serve as a tool to let an unspecified number of people know your account.

item.title: [Python] The back side of the ring-fit adventure stock bot that eradicates resale yard
item.description: #2020/01/11 Ringfit Adventure Arrival bot has been renewed because it has frozen. Thank you for your continued support for Listed Dolphin @ Ringfit Adventure. Overview Get notified when Ringfit Adventures arrives at a list price on Amazon Ringfit adventure arrival bot I made. I will introduce the back side of this bot. Eradicate the resale yard. #Background Ringfit Adventure is very popular. The product has been in short supply since its release.

item.title: [Python] Beginners of GoogleMaps API and Twitter API made tweet map
item.description: #Introduction If I knew when and where I tweeted, I thought it would be fun to look like a life log, so I made a tweet map. It is the first time to touch GoogleMaps API and TwtterAPI. Thanks to various sites. .. .. .. ![Screenshot 2019-11-25 14.14.55.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/445408/d4ca8dcd-e24a-ca6e-b09c-(df19ed888805.png) ⬆️ This is when riding a bicycle on the Shimanami Kaido (It’s fun to know where you were and what you were doing!

item.title: [Python] Twitter posting client made with Flask with simple login function
item.description: Learning #Flask Flask because I touched both bottle and Django. We will use the Twitter API again as usual. $python3 -m venv flaskworks $ ls flaskworks/ $ .flaskworks/bin/activate (flaskworks)$ pip install flask (flaskworks)$ pip install requests requests_oauthlib It’s very easy to create a directory like a bottle. (flaskworks)$ cd flaskworks (flaskworks)$ mkdir static (flaskworks)$ mkdir templates Make a template Two are created because the template inheritance is used. <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="ja"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/css/style.

item.title: [Python] Vocabulary assessment score distribution
item.description: #Vocabulary test On August 18, 2016, A Certain Diagnosis buzzed. [Hashtag search #My vocabulary is](https://twitter.com/hashtag/%E7%A7%81%E3%81%AE%E8%AA%9E%E5%BD%99%E5%8A(%9B%E3%81%AF?src=hash) This diagnosis is scored by answering the four-choice question about 50 synonyms/antagonists and tells you where you are in the distribution. However, it is obvious that this score is not “top 0.43%” without searching for the corresponding hashtag #my vocabulary on Twitter… So I took the score distribution. ~~** In the first place, I do not say that such a diagnosis has no credibility.
